mapper.insert: insert into tb_buyer (b_firstname, b_lastname, b_tel, b_birth, b_email, b_pw) values(#{b_firstname}, #{b_lastname}, #{b_tel}, #{b_birth}, #{b_email}, #{b_pw})
INSERT INTO tb_buyer_info (b_idx, b_nickname) VALUES (#{b_idx}, CONCAT('rootuser', #{b_idx}))
mapper.select: select b_pw from tb_buyer where b_email = #{b_email}
select * from tb_buyer b, tb_buyer_state bs, tb_buyer_info bi where b.b_idx = bs.b_idx and b.b_idx = bi.b_idx and b_email = #{b_email}
mapper.update: update tb_buyer set b_lastlogindate = now() where b_idx = #{b_idx}

update tb_buyer set
b_firstname = #{b_firstname}, b_lastname = #{b_lastname}, b_modifydate = now()
b_birth = #{b_birth}, b_modifydate = now()
b_tel = #{b_tel}, b_modifydate = now()
b_pw = #{b_pw}, b_modifydate = now(), b_pwmodifydate = now()
where b_idx = #{b_idx}
mapper.select: select * from tb_buyer_address where b_idx = #{b_idx} and ba_check = 'Y' order by ba_check desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_buyer_address (b_idx, ba_firstname, ba_lastname, ba_address, ba_restaddress, ba_zipcode, ba_contact, ba_check) values(#{b_idx}, #{ba_firstname}, #{ba_lastname}, #{ba_address}, #{ba_restaddress}, #{ba_zipcode}, #{ba_contact}, #{ba_check})
